title: Senior Salesforce Marketing Cloud Consultant
content:
Position Summary
SFMC Consultant will be responsible for building and leading our Salesforce Marketing Cloud practice, assisting sales and project management to ensure customer success. This role will work closely with Salesforce and Media.Monk’s other business channels helping to educate members, share expertise, and be instrumental in helping to grow the Salesforce Marketing Cloud practice. The ideal candidate will have experience coming up through the practitioner and consultant ranks, executing email marketing campaigns and an understanding of data integration into/out of Email Service Providers (ESP) as well as have strong presentation and interpersonal skills.
Requirements

Salesforce certified with a minimum of 3 years of experience in SFMC implementations.
Lead the capability which is responsible for the implementation of SFDC Marketing Cloud services including Journey Builder, Audience, Email, Social Studios or equivalent services. Expertise in Evergage or Pardot a plus.
Support Sales in partnership with Salesforce on new business opportunities
Work closely with Analytics and Data teams to provide a best-in-class SF and Google integration services which leverage the best that both platforms can offer for the Advertiser/Marketer
Lead complex targeting and personalisation strategies, utilising informed data points to develop advanced segmentation decisions
Collaborate with other business channels to devise appropriate cross-channel efforts and communication streams
Proactively research and identify opportunities to further drive revenue through customer campaigns and improve marketing efficiencies
Someone that wants to grow and get to the next level.
Demonstrable experience in email/customer marketing, CRM, analytics or equivalent
Cross -channel business acumen
Passionate about leveraging data to achieve business outcomes
Highly proficient with marketing technologies (specifically campaign management, data management platforms); general knowledge of HTML
Proven ability to learn from others as well as develop, and mentor a team 

Competencies

Excellent customer service/people skills 
Communicate effectively both verbal/written 
Possess/maintain analytical/problem-solving skills 
Exercises substantial latitude in determining objectives and approaches to critical assignments.

 
#LI-BK1 #LI-HybridAbout Media.Monks:
Media.Monks is the purely digital operating brand of S4Capital plc that connects 8,600+ digital natives across one global team. We are united by a mission to shift industries forward and pave the path towards ambitious outcomes so our clients and our people can realize their full potential for growth. Our unified model combines solutions in media, data, social, platforms, studio, experience, brand and technology services to help our clients continuously reinvent themselves throughout increasingly rapid cycles of disruption. Our efforts to shape culture, build innovative technologies and unlock the future of growth have earned recognition from numerous esteemed panels: we maintain a constant presence on Adweek’s Fastest Growing lists (2019-22), regular recognition at Cannes Lions, inclusion in AdExchanger’s Programmatic Power Players (2020-23), the title of Webby Production Company of the Year (2021-23), a record number of FWAs, and have earned a spot on Newsweek’s Top 100 Global Most Loved Workplaces 2023. Together, these achievements solidify our experience in digital innovation, excellence in craft, and commitment to personal growth.
While we continue to grow our teams, please be mindful of fraudulent job postings and recruiting activities that may use our company name and information. Please be mindful to protect your personal information, especially your national identification number, and bank account information during a recruiting process. While Media.Monks may reach out to potential candidates via LinkedIn, we will always ask applicants to apply through our website (https://media.monks.com/careers) and will never ask for payment or bank account information during the recruitment process.
Disclaimer: 


Responsible for resourcing and implementing security controls for your teams processes and systems


Responsible that all your personnel apply information security in accordance with the established information security policy
